product_overview: Voiceflow is an AI-powered voice transcription platform featuring a seamless user experience for recording, uploading, and transcribing audio with real-time visualization and AI-driven accuracy using AssemblyAI. The platform integrates OAuth authentication, file management, transcription services, and project organization within a responsive, modern Next.js application.
core_goals: Enable users to easily record or upload audio files for transcription.
Deliver highly accurate, real-time speech-to-text transcription using AssemblyAI with speaker diarization.
Provide secure user authentication through OAuth providers like Google and GitHub.
Offer users an intuitive dashboard to manage, search, and organize their transcriptions and projects.
Ensure data security and privacy utilizing Supabase PostgreSQL with row-level security and secure storage.
Present a polished, responsive, and engaging landing page to showcase the platform's capabilities and convert visitors.
key_features: OAuth-based authentication system integrating Google and GitHub providers for secure login.
Drag-and-drop and recording interface for uploading audio files with live waveform visualization and mobile support.
AI transcription powered by AssemblyAI featuring speaker diarization and real-time processing.
Supabase PostgreSQL database with row-level security policies for managing user data securely.
Cloud storage of audio files via Supabase Storage ensuring secure and scalable file management.
Dashboard interface displaying user statistics, recent transcriptions, and quick action capabilities.
Transcription management with advanced search, filtering, and bulk operations to improve usability.
Project organization system allowing grouping and management of related transcriptions.
Settings panel for managing user preferences and account configurations.
Responsive and animated landing page with interactive voice demo, benefits showcase, use cases, and competitor comparisons using Framer Motion and Tailwind CSS.
user_flow_summary: Users sign up or sign in via OAuth using Google or GitHub through NextAuth.js.
Authenticated users access the dashboard showing an overview of their transcription activities.
Users upload audio files via drag-and-drop or record voice directly in the browser with real-time waveform visualization.
The uploaded or recorded audio is sent to AssemblyAI for transcription including speaker diarization.
Transcriptions are saved securely in the Supabase PostgreSQL database and audio files stored in Supabase Storage.
Users can view, search, filter, and manage their transcriptions via the transcriptions interface.
Users can organize transcriptions into projects for easier grouping and retrieval.
Users adjust account settings, preferences, and manage their profiles through the settings panel.
Visitors can explore the marketing landing page featuring interactive demos and feature showcases before signing up.
validation_criteria: Successful OAuth authentication using both Google and GitHub providers with secure session management.
Accurate transcription of audio files verified against AssemblyAI API responses including speaker diarization.
Reliable drag-and-drop file uploads and direct voice recording with live waveform feedback across devices.
Secure storage and retrieval of user data and audio files with enforced row-level security in Supabase.
Comprehensive dashboard displaying correct user stats and recent transcriptions.
Efficient search, filter, and bulk operations in the transcriptions management UI without errors.
Correct grouping and accessibility of transcriptions within user projects.
Responsive and smooth landing page animations and interactive elements functioning across multiple browsers and devices.
Settings changes persist correctly and update user profiles without data loss or error.
